entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -40.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 09:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -40.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -58
Dewpoint: -44.2°C
Wind: NNE 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 38.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 36 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 36 by morning. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
